prerequisite: Dragonborn, any arcane class, Draconic Spellcaster.
name: Ninefold Master
text:
In ancient Arkhosia, arcane spellcasters studied the Ninefold Path, a way toward both arcane mastery and spiritual awakening. The steps along the path represent an increasing attunement to the draconic energies in the initiateâ€™s being, a practice that unites the study of magic with the innate characteristics of the dragonborn race.
You are a master of the Ninefold Path, on your way toward arcane perfection as the scholars of Arkhosia understood it. Your dragon breath is another spell in your arsenal, and when you use spells that create the same elemental force as your breath, you demonstrate mastery over the magic that powers them.

features.breathExpertise(11thLevel): Your dragon breath power is considered an arcane power belonging to each of your arcane classes
features.dragonBreathAction(ninefoldMaster)(11thL: When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can also use your dragon breath as a free action, even if you have already expended it in this encounter
features.draconicResistance(16thLevel): Choose one damage type you can deal with your dragon breath power

flavorText: I have mastered a study of magic that was ancient when your kind were barbarians at our feet.
